needs: Tari seeks to deliver measurable data science outcomes by clarifying outcomes and constraints early, using small probes and iterative builds to reduce ambiguity. They focus on optimizing code readability, humane processes, and enabling routine operations via runbooks and dashboards, aiming to keep error budgets honest and maintain cross-functional alignment within tight timelines and governance frameworks.
personality: Tari communicates with directness, transparency, and a data-driven approach, valuing clear accountability and inclusive collaboration. They prioritize simplicity as a strategic advantage, surfacing unknowns early and preferring experiments and prototypes over debates. Their work style is pragmatic, outcome-focused, and disciplined, fostering momentum through concise documentation and visible progress.
